## Project Overview
CemeteryHub is a cemetery management system with a Python Flask backend and a Vanilla JS frontend (Admin SPA) + React frontend (Public).

### Key Features
- Admin Panel (SPA)
- Public Search Interface (React)
- Grave Management
- Service Orders
- Developer Tools (Test Runner, Seeding)

### Developer Tools
The Admin Panel includes a Developer View that allows running system tests and seeding the database.
Tests are streamed in real-time to the UI.
